title: Was he a homosexual who raped a 5 - year - old boy and found him dead in prison with "his hiding missing? "
subtitle: A man convicted of sexual offences against a child who died in prison, but not in the awful way alleged by fake news bugs.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A person with a sexual disability was found dead in his cell after his testicles were removed and his injuries were not treated.
